items.title: Smart Contact Suggestions
items.description: Share lists faster with intelligent contact suggestions based on people you've shared with before. Start typing to see suggestions with avatars and shared list counts.

items.title: Enhanced Share Dialog
items.description: Beautiful autocomplete interface for sharing lists. Select from your contacts or enter any email address manually.

items.title: Improved Sharing Status
items.description: More accurate display of private vs shared lists with correct member counts throughout the app.

items.title: Better User Experience
items.description: Smoother sign-in flow and improved error handling for a more reliable experience.
